alert.note: Alert for Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued January 07 at 4:11PM EST until January 08 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding and beach erosion expected as strong south winds build waves as high as 14 feet. * WHERE...Southern Schoolcraft County. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Some roads closed and low lying property including parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses may be inundated near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
